thawada madhyasara pana saha dumkola, redipili ha pawahan, gruha bhanda, gruha upakarana ha gruha eekaka nadaththu, winodathmaka ha sanskruthika, aapanashala ha hotal saha wiwidha bhanda ha sewa upakandayan hi mila ganan da 2016 okthobar masaya thula di ihala giyeya.
eeka karana eka lesiyi.

pradeshaye ithihasaya gana manawa dath pasal garuwarayaku wana unagollawa padinchi ajith kumara jayasinha mahathage adahas dakwimen usgala gana danuwath wu api ohuta sthuthi kara pitawune komarika gala yaya aashritha wawa ihaththawata yannataya.

this awuruddak yuddha karapu moda wade dan hari nawaththanna nam apita marena hama ekama api wagema minissu kiyana de therum ganna wenawa.

pasuwa api girawa gena aawa.mese girawa suwapath wu sati waidya wisheshagnya widya aacharya susila senawirathna mahathmiya mese kiwaya.ape rohale pradhana waidya wisheshagnyawaraya wana piyasena senewirathna mahatha, girawa pariksha kara bala “me girawa marila naha” yayi pawasuwa.
prashne thiyenne oya okkoma mata pitin hadarim witharayi.

yojitha idame godanangili ha pol gas, kos ha ambaa gas, kaju ha thambaili gas athulu bhauthika sampath pilibanda warthawak ee siyalu de adangu kara idama rajayata pawara dimata kamathi bawata idam himiyage athsanin yuthu lipi lekhana departhamenthuwata yawiya yuthu wiya.me wanawita idam himikaru me pilibandawa dadi kopayakin ha wairayakin pasuwu athara idama pawara ganimata ena kawareku hata wuwada tharjananguli esawimata ohu sudanamwa sitina bawata thorathuru wada balu widuhalpathita danagannata labi thibini.

ithiri mudal gewima sandaha warthamana adhyaksha mandalaya athulu pirisa danata labha labime kramayak kriyathmaka karana nisa siyalu sewakayange sahayogaya athiwa labana labhayen adala mudal gewimata ikmanin katayuthu karanawa.ee kese wethath wiwaha, hrudayabadha, pilika wani thoragath awasthawaladi adala mudala sampurnayen gewimata danatamath katayuthu yoda thibenawa.mathale el.hewagamamathale nagaraye sita ki.mi.20 k obben gammaduwa game wesena apage daruwanta sawasa pasal ari ennata bas ratha natha.
ee siyalu wisthara liya thabimata me liyawilla ida madiya.

wasara 1996 pawathi loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye shri lankawa ha indiyawa athara pawathi ardha awasan purwa tharagaye di hitapu indiya pithikaruwan tharagaya pawadima pilibanda chodana sambandhayen wimarshanayak pawathwiya yuthu bawa indiya krida amathyawaraya erata palaka mandalayen illa atha.kalkata hi pawathi shri lanka - indiya tharagaye di wadagath thirana sambandhayen thama thula prabala sakayak athi bawa hitapu kridaka winod kambili wasara 2000 di pawasa thibuni.kridakayeku mewani chodanawak kalawita ee sambandhawa sampurna wimarshanayak kala yuthu bawa krida amathya aaje marken pawasa thibuni.1996 wasare pawathi loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye di shri lankawa surathawa dinagaththe ya.

meka awasthawak karagaththu itha balawath arabi welenda (nama mathaka na...)rahasa eli nokirimatanam min pasu ema warada nokarana lesath,arabi karayen pamini thaman muslim aagame balayen yakshaya winasha kara bawath,ema nisa muslim aagama itha balawath bawath,sama denama methan patan budu dahama athahara islam dahama walanda gatha yuthu bawath danwiya.raja eda patan mala diwayina islam rajyayak lesata prakashayata path karalu.adatath wenath kisidu aagamak ho aagamakata sambanda lipiyak ho maladiwayine pala nowe.kotinma kiyanawanam wesak kad ekak,naththal kad ekak wath maladiwayinata thapalen enne na.owun eewa winasha karanawa.ese muslim warun winasha kara damu wehera wiharasthana wala natambaun adatath dakunu desa athi samahara jana shunya dupath wala thibenawalu.me kathawe sathya asathya nam mama hariyatama danne na.eeth pera bauddha ratak wa thibi pasuwa balahath karayen islam dahama waladagath bawa nam wishwasa karanna puluwan.

mathru ha lama saukhya sewa sapayimata gath mulma sanwidhanathmaka uthsahaya wanuye 1926 "saukhya eekaka" kramaya handunwa di palamu saukhya eekakaya kaluthara pihituwa karyabhara saukhya waidya niladhariwarayek path kirima ya. 1965 di "pawul salasuma" rajaya wisin prathipaththiyak lesa piliganunu athara eya mathru ha lama saukhya wada satahana samanga eekabaddha kerini. 1968 di jathika wadagathkama salaka mema wadasatahan diwayina pura kriyathmaka kirimata saukhya amathyanshaya thula wenama eekakayak pihituwanu labiya.
